strickland-plumbing-maintenance:
Strickland Plumbing, operating as 'Strickland Plumbing' rather than 'Strickland Plumbing & Maintenance,' is a plumbing business based in Pelham, Alabama. Here is a comprehensive summary of the available information:

Strickland Plumbing has been in business since January 1, 2018, and is registered as a sole proprietorship. The business is owned and managed by Mr. David Strickland[1].

The business is located at 1839 Chanbury Cir, Pelham, AL 35124-1454. It can be contacted through the phone number (205) 368-0503, and there is an email option available through the Better Business Bureau (BBB) profile[1].

Strickland Plumbing is not accredited by the BBB, although it has a BBB rating of A+. The BBB file for this business was opened on June 6, 2018[1].

The business holds a license issued by the State of Alabama Plumbers & Gas Fitters Examining Board, with the license number MPG-1034. The license is set to expire on December 31, 2024[1].

Strickland Plumbing offers various plumbing services, including plumbing renovations, commercial plumbing, plumbing fixtures, plumbing and heating, and plumbing supplies. However, specific details about the scope of their services are not extensively detailed in the available sources[1].

There is no additional information available from other sources that provides further insights into the business practices, customer reviews, or any notable achievements of Strickland Plumbing beyond what is listed on the BBB profile. If more detailed information is required, it would likely need to be obtained directly from the business or through local customer reviews that are not currently available online.
